### isPassEnabled() {#aee664c21a9659d262c33bc98eeeba042}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AMDGPUCodeGenPassBuilder::isPassEnabled (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt</a>&lt; bool &gt; &amp; Opt, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2">CodeGenOptLevel</a> Level=<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2a7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">CodeGenOptLevel::Default</a>) const</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if a pass is enabled given <code>Opt</code> option.

The option always overrides defaults if explicitly used. Otherwise its default will be used given that a pass shall work at an optimization <code>Level</code> minimum.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h/#l00184">184</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-h">AMDGPUTargetMachine.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp/#l02120">2120</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgputargetmachine-cpp">AMDGPUTargetMachine.cpp</a>.
